price: 59. Dus verzegelt Allah de harten van degenen die niet weten.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yaṭbaʿu al-lahu ʿalā qulūbi alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
